name: Shinkai: Aave Loan Requester
description: Tool for requesting a loan on Aave, including selecting assets to supply and borrow with their APYs
author: Shinkai

chromePath.description: Optional path to Chrome executable for browser automation

inputValue.description: The amount of tokens to supply or borrow

assetSymbol.description: The symbol of the asset to supply or borrow (e.g., 'ETH', 'USDC')

amountProcessed.description: The actual amount of tokens that were processed in the loan request
